channel.title: Rod's Planet
channel.description: A show as random as its host. Each week Rod brings you his colorful opinions on whatever he feels like talking about! Never a dull moment and never the same topic twice!!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Random topics from a random guy!
channel.itunes:author: Rod Villagomez
channel.itunes:summary: A show as random as its host. Each week Rod brings you his colorful opinions on whatever he feels like talking about! Never a dull moment and never the same topic twice!!

item.title: Episode 7
item.description: In which I try to make the world a better place by helping you to become a good neighbor. Check out the blog post "The Top 10 Ways to Be a Good Neighbor" here http://shadesbreath.hubpages.com/hub/Top-10-Ways-to-Be-a-Good-Neighbor. This week's spotlight band is Lindsay's Remorse, find them on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/lindsaysremorse.
item.dc:creator: Rod Villagomez
item.itunes:summary: In which I try to make the world a better place by helping you to become a good neighbor. Check out the blog post "The Top 10 Ways to Be a Good Neighbor" here http://shadesbreath.hubpages.com/hub/Top-10-Ways-to-Be-a-Good-Neighbor. This week's spotlight band is Lindsay's Remorse, find them on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/lindsaysremorse.

item.title: Episode 6
item.description: In which I give a little hell to bad parents the world over and hand out the worst parent of the year awards in a special Rod's Planet awards show. All that plus news and more.
item.dc:creator: Rod Villagomez
item.itunes:summary: In which I give a little hell to bad parents the world over and hand out the worst parent of the year awards in a special Rod's Planet awards show. All that plus news and more.

item.title: Episode 5
item.description: In which I turn the tables on those who claim that steroids are ruining sports also news headlines and introducing a talented unsigned artist. Rod's Planet is new and improved for the new year!
item.dc:creator: Rod Villagomez
item.itunes:summary: In which I turn the tables on those who claim that steroids are ruining sports also news headlines and introducing a talented unsigned artist. Rod's Planet is new and improved for the new year!

item.title: Episode 4
item.description: In which I get everbody ready to go back to school. A quiz to help you prepare for the SAT's and help picking that all important college along with many new features are all wrapped in a fresh new package!
item.dc:creator: Rod Villagomez
item.itunes:summary: In which I get everbody ready to go back to school. A quiz to help you prepare for the SAT's and help picking that all important college along with many new features are all wrapped in a fresh new package!

item.title: Episode 3
item.description: In which I empart my "Pigskin Preview". A look at my picks for division champions, conference champs and ultimately reveal my Super Bowl XLI prediction.
item.dc:creator: Rod Villagomez
item.itunes:summary: In which I empart my "Pigskin Preview". A look at my picks for division champions, conference champs and ultimately reveal my Super Bowl XLI prediction.

item.title: Episode 2
item.description: In which I take a look at the ways to lose at poker. Everyone is telling you how to win, but no one is telling you how to lose... until now.
item.dc:creator: Rod Villagomez
item.itunes:summary: In which I take a look at the ways to lose at poker. Everyone is telling you how to win, but no one is telling you how to lose... until now.

item.title: Rod's Planet Episode 1
item.description: In which I look at the "Super Celebrity" craze and administer a quiz to determine your level of involvement.
item.dc:creator: Rod Villagomez
item.itunes:summary: In which I look at the "Super Celebrity" craze and administer a quiz to determine your level of involvement.
